new_tag_requests.name: Search with Tags Filter
new_tag_requests.description: Search products filtered by tags - finds all dairy products

new_tag_requests.name: Search Multiple Tags
new_tag_requests.description: Search with multiple tag filters - finds fermented dairy products

new_tag_requests.name: Advanced Search with All Filters
new_tag_requests.description: Comprehensive search using tags, price range, store filter, and fuzzy matching

body.query:
query ComprehensiveSearch($input: SearchInput!) {
    searchProducts(input: $input) {
      queryString
      totalCount
      hasMore
      products {
        product {
          id
          name
          brand
          category
          subcategory
          tags
          price {
            current
            original
            currency
            discountPercent
            discountAmount
            isDiscounted
          }
          unitSize
          unitType
          unitPrice
          imageURL
          isOnSale
          isCurrentlyOnSale
          isAvailable
          validFrom
          validTo
          isValid
          extractionConfidence
          store {
            id
            code
            name
            logoURL
          }
          flyer {
            id
            title
            validFrom
            validTo
            isCurrent
            daysRemaining
          }
        }
        searchScore
        matchType
      }
      pagination {
        totalItems
        currentPage
        totalPages
      }
    }
  }

new_tag_requests.name: Tag-Only Filter (All Daily Products)
new_tag_requests.description: Filter products by tag without text search - shows all daily essentials

new_tag_requests.name: Get Product with Tags
new_tag_requests.description: Get single product including tags field

body.query:
query GetProductWithTags($id: Int!) {
    product(id: $id) {
      id
      name
      normalizedName
      brand
      category
      subcategory
      description
      tags
      price {
        current
        original
        currency
        discount
        discountPercent
        discountAmount
        isDiscounted
      }
      unitSize
      unitType
      unitPrice
      imageURL
      isOnSale
      isCurrentlyOnSale
      validFrom
      validTo
      extractionConfidence
      extractionMethod
      requiresReview
      store {
        id
        code
        name
      }
      flyer {
        id
        title
        validFrom
        validTo
      }
    }
  }

new_tag_requests.name: Lithuanian Diacritics Search
new_tag_requests.description: Test Lithuanian character handling with fuzzy search

updated_queries.note: Add 'tags' field to all product queries
